summary: DOGE’S SISTER - The baby was abandoned by her mother with her eyes still open and the umbilical cord still attached, left on the cold concrete floor and then rescued. Her biological sister who was rescued with her also died soon after, but she grew up healthy thanks to the loving and devoted care of her adoptive mother. She joined our family in July 2010. Her birthday is May 13. She is 14 years old. She is a proud tsundere queen.
